about-long.paragraph: OpenGL Image (GLI) is a header only C++ image library for graphics software based on the OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL) specification and released under the MIT license.
For more information about GLI, please have a look at the manual and the API reference documentation.
Thanks for contributing to the project by submitting issues for bug reports and feature requests. Any feedback is welcome at gli@g-truc.net.
